law.text:
As used in KRS 154.1-700 to 154.1-745, unless the context indicates otherwise:
"Allowance" means a twice-monthly payment granted volunteers during the term of their service. For the purposes of KRS 154.1-700 to 154.1-745, an allowance shall not be considered a salary or a wage.
"Board" means the Kentucky Peace Corps Governing Board created by KRS 154.1-705.
"Community/user" means the nonprofit entity or entities for which a task is being performed by a volunteer or volunteers.
"Corps" means Kentucky Peace Corps created by KRS 154.1-715.
"Director" means the chief administrative officer of the corps appointed pursuant to the provisions of KRS 154.1-715.
"Employee" means "employee" as defined by KRS 18A.005.
"Volunteer" means Kentucky Peace Corps volunteers selected pursuant to the provisions of KRS 154.1-710.
law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 100, sec. 1, effective July 14, 1992.
